Subject: know any Metric tools?
Message-ID: <9ksenk+remq@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 465
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: kgip@...

I am familiar with JDepend and find it quite beneficial at the 
package level on caller/called (afferent/efferent)metric and like the 
instability measurement.  However I have also been asked to find 
metrics for funtion caller/called with locations (line #, etc), 
totals of what programs use a specific method, etc.  Looked at CDOC 
for Java, C++, and C. Wondering if anyone has used the metric 
portions of JEDIT or if you know of a tool "that will do it all".
subject: know any Metric tools?
